location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Newnham, Secretary to the Government, Financial Department, Bombay to William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: The letter is informing the Resident that the Governor of Bombay has been authorized by the Governor General of India to make cost reductions. It therefore instructs the Resident to report on any savings that could be made at the Bushire Residency.
